Base model

registry: ClassVar[_RegistryType] = <sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.registry object>¶

Refers to the _orm.registry in use where new _orm.Mapper objects will be associated.

class src.database.models.Contact(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

Contact model

Inherits Base (DeclarativeBase): Base model from declarative base SQLAlchemy

Attributes:

id (int): Contact ID firstname (str): Contact first name lastname (str): Contact last name birthday (date): Contact birthdate email (str): Contact email phonenumber (str): Contact phone number info (str): Contact information created_at (datetime): Time creation contact updated_at (datetime): Time updated contact user_id (int): The foreign key referencing the user who owns the contact user (User): Contact user

class src.database.models.User(**kwargs)¶

Bases: Base

User model

Inherits Base (DeclarativeBase): Base model from declarative base SQLAlchemy

Attributes:

id (int): User ID username (str): User username email (str): User email hashed_password (str): User hashed password avatar (str): User avatar is_confirmed (bool): Whether the user has confirmed their email created_at (datetime): Time user creation role (UserRole): User role
